alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Randolph (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 4:12PM CDT until March 27 at 11:10PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Spring River At Imboden affecting Randolph and Lawrence Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring River At Imboden. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to late Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Water approaching structures and populated areas of Eastern Imboden. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday afternoon to a crest of 25.0 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 7 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date Spring River Imboden 18.0 7.1 Thu 3 PM 21.9 23.6 17.2 25.0 1 AM 3/25 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
